CODE CR CONTROLS: Section 7.4 specifies branch isolation (cr-094), qualification required, merge gate. Section 7.5 provides concrete qualified state continuity: before (c83dda0, EFFECTIVE v16.0/v20.0, CLI-11.0), during (unchanged), post (merged, EFFECTIVE v17.0/v21.0, CLI-12.0).

FORMATTING: Consistent heading levels, table formatting, horizontal rules, backtick code references throughout. No typos or errors detected.

Recommend approval.
